title: Correct dotProduct parameters+syntax documentation
description: Stumbled across it being documented as dotProduct(numericArray) when it should be dotProduct(numericArray, numericArray) - no?

comments.content:
Attached proposed patch – Joel Bernstein and/or Cassandra Targett, would you have a moment to double-check the edit for content accuracy?

(The return value is documented as A number. here whereas other places say A numeric. but since I'm not sure if that's a just a stylistic or an actual difference I left that bit unchanged.)
comments.author: Christine Poerschke
